title: Homemade lemon meringue pie
ingredients: ['For the pastry base', "300g plain or '00' flour", '150g caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '8g baking powder', '50ml extra virgin olive oil', '2 small eggs or 1 egg and 1 egg yolk, lightly beaten', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'For the lemon filling', '30g potato starch', '150g caster sugar', '200ml lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '30g butter', '3 egg yolks', '200ml water', '4g gelatine (in sheets)', 'For the meringue', '3 egg whites', '1 pinch cream of tartar (or baking soda)', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '150g icing sugar']
